title: MacKinnon Recipe
full_text:
MacKinnon Recipe

Ingredients

ounces

ounce
white

1/2
ounce
fresh
lime juice
1/2
ounce
fresh lemon juice
Chilled
club soda
Directions
Combine everything except club soda in a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake well for 10 seconds and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Top with chilled club soda.
